feed.title: Spark NLP
feed.subtitle: High Performance NLP with Apache Spark

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Afrikaans (lemma_afribooms)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_afribooms) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms) in Afrikaans language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_afribooms
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: af
Size: 109.9 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms
entry.summary: Description Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_afribooms) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms) in Afrikaans language. Live Demo Open in Colab Download How to use PythonScalaNLU document = DocumentAssembler()\ .setInputCol("text")\ .setOutputCol("document") sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ .setInputCols(["document"])\ .setOutputCol("sentence") tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ .setOutputCol("token") lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af")\ .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ .setOutputCol("lemma") pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma]) data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text") result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data) val document = new DocumentAssembler() .setInputCol("text") .setOutputCol("document") val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx") .setInputCols("document") .setOutputCol("sentence") val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() .setInputCols("sentence") .setOutputCol("token") val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af") .setInputCols("sentence", "token") .setOutputCol("lemma") val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma)) val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text") val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data) Model Information Model Name: lemma_afribooms Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+ License: Open Source Edition: Official Input Labels: [form] Output Labels: [lemma] Language: af Size: 109.9 KB References Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Lithuanian (lemma_alksnis)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_alksnis) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Lithuanian-ALKSNIS) in Lithuanian language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_alksnis", "lt")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

  .setInputCols("document")

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Dutch (lemma_alpino)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_alpino) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Dutch-Alpino) in Dutch language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_alpino", "nl")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_alpino", "nl")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_alpino
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: nl
Size: 361.3 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Dutch-Alpino

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Dutch-Alpino

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Catalan (lemma_ancora)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_ancora) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Catalan-AnCora) in Catalan language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ancora", "ca")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ancora", "ca")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_ancora
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: ca
Size: 384.0 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Catalan-AnCora

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Catalan-AnCora

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Spanish (lemma_ancora)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_ancora) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Spanish-AnCora) in Spanish language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ancora", "es")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ancora", "es")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_ancora
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: es
Size: 452.6 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Spanish-AnCora

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Spanish-AnCora

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Gaelic (lemma_arcosg)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_arcosg) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Gaelic-ARCOSG) in Gaelic language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_arcosg", "gd")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_arcosg", "gd")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_arcosg
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: gd
Size: 122.6 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Gaelic-ARCOSG

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Gaelic-ARCOSG

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Armenian (lemma_armtdp)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_armtdp) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Armenian-ArmTDP) in Armenian language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hy")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hy")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_armtdp
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: hy
Size: 210.7 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Armenian-ArmTDP

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Armenian-ArmTDP

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Armenian (lemma_armtdp)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_armtdp) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Armenian-ArmTDP) in Armenian language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hyw")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hyw")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_armtdp
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: hyw
Size: 301.1 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Armenian-ArmTDP

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Armenian-ArmTDP

entry.title: Lemma UD model for English (lemma_atis)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_atis) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_English-Atis) in English language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_atis", "en")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_atis", "en")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_atis
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: en
Size: 56.2 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_English-Atis

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_English-Atis

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Turkish (lemma_atis)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_atis) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Turkish-Atis) in Turkish language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_atis", "tr")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])
    
data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)
    



val document = new DocumentAssembler()
  .setInputCol("text")
  .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
  .setInputCols("document")
  .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")
    
val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_atis", "tr")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")
    
val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_atis
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: tr
Size: 72.5 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Turkish-Atis

https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Turkish-Atis
